meanings.definition: A type of instant noodle snack.
meanings.sent1: I love eating mamee for a quick snack.
meanings.sent2: The mamee was delicious and crunchy.
meanings.sent3: The kids giggled as they shared a pack of mamee.
meanings.sent4: The mamee was a lifesaver during the camping trip.
meanings.sent5: The colorful packaging of the mamee caught my eye.

meanings.definition: To refer to a mother in a childish or affectionate way.
meanings.sent1: The little girl would mamee her mom when asking for a hug.
meanings.sent2: He would often mamee his mother when feeling scared.
meanings.sent3: The siblings would playfully mamee their mom to get her attention.
meanings.sent4: She would always mamee her mom for a bedtime story.
meanings.sent5: The toddler would mamee his mom for a piggyback ride.
